1.0.name: wordpress/o2-video-widget
1.0.description:
The O2 Widget is a great way to enrich your Wordpress powered site by displaying the very latest video tips and advice from the UK's leading mobile operator, O2 in your sidebar. The O2 Widget updates automatically to display snippets of the latest videos from the O2 Guru team, providing you with rich content that sits on your pages. The feed is updated on a regular basis so you're assured of showing fresh content on your own Wordpress site.

By installing the O2 embeddable application ("O2 Widget") and using it to display O2 content you agree to the terms set out below.

  1. O2 grants you a non-exclusive licence to use the O2 Widget to display the O2 content only. All rights including intellectual property rights in the O2 Widget and O2 content remain the property of the O2.
  2. You may not (or allow a third party to) copy, re-publish, edit, alter or add to the O2 content in any way, nor combine the O2 content with any other material. You may not copy, distribut
